unnormalised: AIIMS Delhi witnessed a rare surgery performed by Dr. Rajiv Sharma, HOD of Cardiology, last week. The patient, Mr. Rakesh Kumar, had been suffering from a complex heart condition for over 5 yrs.
normalised: A-I-I-M-S Delhi witnessed a rare surgery performed by Doctor Rajiv Sharma, H-O-D of Cardiology, last week. The patient, Mister Rakesh Kumar, had been suffering from a complex heart condition for over five years.

unnormalised: Initially, Dr. Kumar Verma, a renowned General Physician from Apollo Hospital, had diagnosed the issue. He referred Mr. Kumar to AIIMS, citing the need for specialized care. The surgery, involving a minimally invasive procedure, lasted for approximately 6 hrs.
normalised: Initially, Doctor Kumar Verma, a renowned General Physician from Apollo Hospital, had diagnosed the issue. He referred Mister Kumar to A-I-I-M-S, citing the need for specialized care. The surgery, involving a minimally invasive procedure, lasted for approximately six hours.

unnormalised: According to sources within the hospital, Dr. Aisha Khan, Senior Resident, played a crucial role in the pre-operative assessment. The team also included Nurse Jyoti Patel and Technician Suresh Nair, all contributing to the successful outcome under the guidance of Prof. Meena Krishnan.
normalised: According to sources within the hospital, Doctor Aisha Khan, Senior Resident, played a crucial role in the pre-operative assessment. The team also included Nurse Jyoti Patel and Technician Suresh Nair, all contributing to the successful outcome under the guidance of Professor Meena Krishnan.

unnormalised: The patient is now recovering well and is expected to be discharged by 15/07/2024. This successful operation has further solidified AIIMS Delhi's reputation as a leading medical institution in India.
normalised: The patient is now recovering well and is expected to be discharged by fifteenth july two thousand and twenty four. This successful operation has further solidified A-I-I-M-S Delhi's reputation as a leading medical institution in India.
